amendment.description: Page 110, after line 19, insert the following new subsection (and redesignate subsequent subsections proposed to be added by the relevant provision accordingly): \ "(h) The Secretary shall develop and implement an outreach program to train and recruit African-American and Latino-American men to become Head Start teachers in order to increase the provision of quality services and instruction to children with diverse backgrounds.".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 109-229 to direct the Secretary to implement an outreach program to train and recruit African-American and Latino-American men to become Head Start teachers in order to increase the provision of quality services and instructions to children with diverse backgrounds.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis (IL) amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 401 - 14 (Roll no. 490).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Davis (IL).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Davis (IL) amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 401 - 14 (Roll no. 490).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
